name: Mutant Fortress
overview:
Take on the role of Brad, post-apocalyptic truck driver gnd all-round hard guy. Evil
mutants have stolen the only thing you really care about. The muties stole your truck,
and now you're well hacked off. You can not rest until you have reclaimed your property.

Battle your way through the zombie infested forest, then through the parched wasteland
before reaching your ultimate objective, the Mutant Fortress itself.
